body_html: @gunan There is a 2.0.0 release which includes the fixes for both of these CVEs. But the jump is from 1.5.3 to 2.0.0 so I assume there would be some porting required (I have not looked into it yet tho). I thought it's best to get these fixes in asap first then looking into porting later can be done at a lower priority. If someone wants to port over to 2.0.0 and run all the tests that'd be a good way to go too.

body: @gunan There is a 2.0.0 release which includes the fixes for both of these CVEs. But the jump is from 1.5.3 to 2.0.0 so I assume there would be some porting required (I have not looked into it yet tho). If someone wants to port over to 2.0.0 and run all the tests that'd be a good way to go too.
